drum something ↔ up.translation[0].defin: to get support, interest, attention etc from people by making an effort
He travelled throughout Latin America drumming up support for the confederation.
The organization is using the event to drum up business (=get more work and sales).
drum something ↔ up.translation[1].defin: if you drum up business or support, you make an effort to get more of it
We have been looking for new ways to drum up business.
